name: The Rewinder (itch)
description:
Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2ABOUT
'The Rewinder' is my first ever game jam game, made completely by me (except for the audiomanager), atleast under 48 hours! It is a grid based, turn based puzzle game with 10 levels where you can rewind the enemies by clicking on them! I know this game isn't perfect in any way (especially because this was my first game jam) but feel free to give me advice, even just for this itch page and thanks for playing!
HOW TO PLAY
[Explained in game]
You are the blue squareClick on the green squares around you to moveWalk into the goal (the yellow square) to finish the levelPress 'r' to restart the levelEnemies will instantly kill you if they hit youEnemies can only walk up, down, left and right, but you can walk diagonally aswellClick on enemies to rewind them if you have enough rewinds (shown at the top of the screen)Walk onto buttons (small red squares) to open the gatesEnemies can also open gates
Tested on windows at 1920x1080
